Motormaster kept his snarl on his face, "I am Motormaster, Leader of the
Stunticons, and infantry of the Decepticon empire. Let's talk buisness" he
curled his upper lip as he spoke those words.

////////////////////////////////////////////////
"I dunno" said Wildrider looking through the binoculars "Motormaster's
probably got it under control. Let's ask him what we should do.
////////////////////////////////////////////////

"Okay" said Speedbreaker having seen Dead-End finish the transmition to
Motormaster. He transformed into his sports car, and started to rev his
engine, "Let's go, it's about fifty miles this way, put the energon
converter and some empty cubes in my trunk" he said.
